You say you’re fine and there’s no need to worry...'"},{"lineNumber":253087,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいだろう、ただし俺と今からセックスしてからだ","translatedEnglishLine":"'Fine, but only after you have sex with me right now.'"},{"lineNumber":253088,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺はお前達を助けた、御褒美がほしい、それに戦うの鋭気を養うために謙信が抱きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"'I helped you all; I want a reward, and moreover, Kenshin, I want to hold you to regain your fighting spirit.'"},{"lineNumber":253089,"originalJapaneseLine":"惚れた弱み・・わかった・・、ただしすぐに戦いに出たいから早い目で頼む","translatedEnglishLine":"'It’s your charm weakness... I understand. But I want to go into battle quickly, so please be quick about it.'"},{"lineNumber":253090,"originalJapaneseLine":"セックスシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Sex scene."},{"lineNumber":253091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し激しくやります、気絶する謙信","translatedEnglishLine":"(They do it a bit more intensely, Kenshin faints.)"},{"lineNumber":253092,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは愛に謙信を預け、出かけます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance entrusts Kenshin to Ai and sets out."},{"lineNumber":253093,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's unit."},{"lineNumber":253094,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみが偵察から戻って来た、前方の小高い山に昨晩の魔物部隊がいるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami returned from reconnaissance: 'The monster unit from last night is on the small hill ahead.'"},{ "lineNumber":253095,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルメイ焼却師団という連中ね、２万弱","translatedEnglishLine":"'They’re called the Lumei Incineration Division, just under 20,000 strong.'"},{ "lineNumber":253096,"originalJapaneseLine":"上杉軍を警戒してるようすよ","translatedEnglishLine":"'They seem to be wary of the Uesugi army.'"},{ "lineNumber":253097,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、では、やるぞ。こちらは小数だからいつものように裏側にまわって","translatedEnglishLine":"'Alright, let’s do this. Let’s set many traps and lie in wait.'"},{ "lineNumber":253105,"originalJapaneseLine":"大変です・・人間の部隊が強襲！","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s terrible... The human troops are launching an assault!"},{ "lineNumber":253106,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、てめぇがボスだな、焼き殺してやるぜ","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gahahahaha, you’re the boss, huh? I’ll burn you to death!'"},{ "lineNumber":253107,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍が倒れて・・魔物兵達は逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster general falls... the monster soldiers flee."},{ "lineNumber":253108,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、これで謙信ちゃんを悩ましていた奴らは全滅だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, with this, those who troubled Kenshin-chan are completely wiped out."},{ "lineNumber":253109,"originalJapaneseLine":"上杉軍陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Uesugi army camp."},{ "lineNumber":253110,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが戻って来た、謙信が目をさまし愛を振り切って出撃しようとしていた所だった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance returned as Kenshin woke up and was about to break away from Ai to sortie."},{ "lineNumber":253111,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前が気になっていた敵は俺が倒した、もう安心しろ","translatedEnglishLine":"'I defeated the enemy you were concerned about. You can relax now.'"},{"lineNumber":253112,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほっとしたような、申し訳ないような謙信、ありがとう、私も次はもっとがんばる","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin, looking relieved yet apologetic: 'Thank you. I will try harder next time too.'"},{ "lineNumber":253113,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまり無茶するな、お前達が無理をさせるな。と愛とかに言う","translatedEnglishLine":"'Don’t overdo it. Don’t push yourselves too hard,' he says to Ai and others."},{ "lineNumber":253114,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理です、では・・謙信様を引き取って下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"'It’s impossible. Then... please take care of Lord Kenshin.'"},{ "lineNumber":253115,"originalJapaneseLine":"上杉軍は私と勝虎で率いてこの地を守る任務を継続します","translatedEnglishLine":"'The Uesugi army will continue the mission to defend this land led by me and Katsutora.'"},{ "lineNumber":253116,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、わかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gahahaha, understood.'"},{ "lineNumber":253117,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じでランスの元に来ます（カードゲット）","translatedEnglishLine":"And with that, they come back to Rance (card obtained)."},{"lineNumber":253118,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信、がんばれよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Kenshin, do your best.'"},{ "lineNumber":253119,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は魔人退治に向かう。","translatedEnglishLine":"'I am heading to hunt demons.'"},{ "lineNumber":253120,"originalJapaneseLine":"と別行動になります","translatedEnglishLine":"'And we separate.'"},{"lineNumber":253121,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t行軍中のランス達、ミラクルメイン","translatedEnglishLine":"'Rance and the others marching, Miracle main.'"},{ "lineNumber":253122,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが世界王になったが別によい、最後は自分がなる","translatedEnglishLine":"'Rance became the World King, but it's alright; in the end, he will be the one who becomes it.'"},{ "lineNumber":253123,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tバボラを見て異次元のスロージャイアントを思い出す","translatedEnglishLine":"'Seeing Babora, remembering the otherworldly Slow Giant.'"},{ "lineNumber":253124,"originalJapaneseLine":"行軍中","translatedEnglishLine":"While marching."},{ "lineNumber":253125,"originalJapaneseLine":"だいぶバボラの近くに来た。数キロ","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ve come quite close to Babora, just a few kilometers."},{ "lineNumber":253126,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっさんがはぁはぁと逃げてきた、助けてくれーと","translatedEnglishLine":"An old man came running, panting, shouting ‘Help me!’"},{ "lineNumber":253127,"originalJapaneseLine":"（立ち絵表示しなくていいです）","translatedEnglishLine":"(No need to show standing picture.)"},{"lineNumber":253128,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物に捕虜として捕まっていたのだが逃げてきたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He had been captured as a prisoner by monsters but escaped."},{ "lineNumber":253129,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいつらしんどい仕事を俺達にさせているんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those bastards make us do the hard work."},{ "lineNumber":253130,"originalJapaneseLine":"今も魔人の食事の材料とかを運ばれていていたが自分だけ逃げ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even now, they are transporting food ingredients for the demons, but he alone escaped."},{ "lineNumber":253131,"originalJapaneseLine":"捕虜には可愛い女の子はいるか？","translatedEnglishLine":"'Are there any cute girls among the prisoners?'"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに謙信が膝を折る、勝子、虎子も倒れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Kenshin falls to his knees; Katsuko and Torako also fall...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達、おお、無茶苦茶強い人間の雌がついに倒れたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters shout, 'Oh, the insanely strong human females have finally fallen.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれーやっちまえー、おい、殺すなよ、みんなで犯してからだーわーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do it—finish them! Hey, don’t kill them, we’ll all rape them first, wahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信達に魔物が飛びかかろうとした所でランスが現れ助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as monsters tried to pounce on Kenshin and the others, Rance appeared and saved them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、ここまでだな、いったん撤退するぞ、愛
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, this is as far as we go. Let's retreat for now, Ai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、と愛が部隊に撤退指示を出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, Ai gave the order to the unit to retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍キャンプ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Military camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が目を覚ます、身体はまだ痛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin wakes up; his body still aches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いはどうなった、奴らはまだ近くにいるのか・・と愛に聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asks Ai, 'What happened with the battle? Are they still nearby?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨夜はギリギリの所でランス様に救われかろうじて脱出した、ルメイ焼却部隊は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai replies, 'Last night, we were saved by Lord Rance at the last moment and barely escaped. The Lumei Incineration Unit...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ近くにいるが、我々も消耗も激しく戦える状態では無い、特に謙信様が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...is still nearby, but we are severely exhausted and not in fighting condition, especially Lord Kenshin...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は大丈夫だと、元気だ・・それよりあの外道部隊を生かしておく訳にはいかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin insists, 'I'm fine, I'm strong... More importantly, we can't leave that fiendish unit alive.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理して出撃しようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He attempts to force himself to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこらランスが現れる、謙信ちゃん起きたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Rance appears, 'Kenshin-chan, you’re awake...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、出撃するだと・・元気だから大丈夫だ心配無用だと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What, you’re going to sortie? You say you’re fine and there’s no need to worry...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいだろう、ただし俺と今からセックスしてからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Fine, but only after you have sex with me right now.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はお前達を助けた、御褒美がほしい、それに戦うの鋭気を養うために謙信が抱きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I helped you all; I want a reward, and moreover, Kenshin, I want to hold you to regain your fighting spirit.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惚れた弱み・・わかった・・、ただしすぐに戦いに出たいから早い目で頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It’s your charm weakness... I understand. But I want to go into battle quickly, so please be quick about it.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し激しくやります、気絶する謙信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They do it a bit more intensely, Kenshin faints.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは愛に謙信を預け、出かけます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance entrusts Kenshin to Ai and sets out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが偵察から戻って来た、前方の小高い山に昨晩の魔物部隊がいるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami returned from reconnaissance: 'The monster unit from last night is on the small hill ahead.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ焼却師団という連中ね、２万弱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'They’re called the Lumei Incineration Division, just under 20,000 strong.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍を警戒してるようすよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'They seem to be wary of the Uesugi army.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、やるぞ。こちらは小数だからいつものように裏側にまわって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Alright, let’s do this. Since we’re few in number, like usual, we’ll go around to the back.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっきにボスを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'We’ll take down the boss all at once.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ焼却師団の司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei Incineration Division Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が大将軍ルメイからの手紙を見て喜んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general happily reads a letter from General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共の多数の焼却についてお褒めの言葉だ。より効率よく焼き殺す為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It praises the mass incineration of humans. For burning them more efficiently...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝方、風下から火をつけよとの指示もかかれている、なるほどとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It also instructs to set fire from downwind in the morning. 'I see,' they say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前方にいる人間の部隊、ＪＡＰＡＮから来た連中はどうしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'How are the human troops ahead, those who came from JAPAN?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も攻めてくるかな、罠をいっぱいしかけて待ち構えておいてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Will they attack again today? Let’s set many traps and lie in wait.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変です・・人間の部隊が強襲！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s terrible... The human troops are launching an assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、てめぇがボスだな、焼き殺してやるぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahahaha, you’re the boss, huh? I’ll burn you to death!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が倒れて・・魔物兵達は逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general falls... the monster soldiers flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、これで謙信ちゃんを悩ましていた奴らは全滅だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, with this, those who troubled Kenshin-chan are completely wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uesugi army camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戻って来た、謙信が目をさまし愛を振り切って出撃しようとしていた所だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance returned as Kenshin woke up and was about to break away from Ai to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が気になっていた敵は俺が倒した、もう安心しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I defeated the enemy you were concerned about. You can relax now.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとしたような、申し訳ないような謙信、ありがとう、私も次はもっとがんばる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, looking relieved yet apologetic: 'Thank you. I will try harder next time too.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり無茶するな、お前達が無理をさせるな。と愛とかに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Don’t overdo it. Don’t push yourselves too hard,' he says to Ai and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理です、では・・謙信様を引き取って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It’s impossible. Then... please take care of Lord Kenshin.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍は私と勝虎で率いてこの地を守る任務を継続します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The Uesugi army will continue the mission to defend this land led by me and Katsutora.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、わかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahaha, understood.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じでランスの元に来ます（カードゲット）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, they come back to Rance (card obtained).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信、がんばれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Kenshin, do your best.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は魔人退治に向かう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I am heading to hunt demons.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と別行動になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And we separate.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達、ミラクルメイン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Rance and the others marching, Miracle main.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが世界王になったが別によい、最後は自分がなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Rance became the World King, but it's alright; in the end, he will be the one who becomes it.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを見て異次元のスロージャイアントを思い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Seeing Babora, remembering the otherworldly Slow Giant.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While marching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶバボラの近くに来た。数キロ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve come quite close to Babora, just a few kilometers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっさんがはぁはぁと逃げてきた、助けてくれーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old man came running, panting, shouting ‘Help me!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （立ち絵表示しなくていいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No need to show standing picture.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に捕虜として捕まっていたのだが逃げてきたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had been captured as a prisoner by monsters but escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつらしんどい仕事を俺達にさせているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those bastards make us do the hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も魔人の食事の材料とかを運ばれていていたが自分だけ逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, they are transporting food ingredients for the demons, but he alone escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕虜には可愛い女の子はいるか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Are there any cute girls among the prisoners?'

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに謙信が膝を折る、勝子、虎子も倒れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Kenshin falls to his knees; Katsuko and Torako also fall...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達、おお、無茶苦茶強い人間の雌がついに倒れたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters shout, 'Oh, the insanely strong human females have finally fallen.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれーやっちまえー、おい、殺すなよ、みんなで犯してからだーわーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do it—finish them! Hey, don’t kill them, we’ll all rape them first, wahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信達に魔物が飛びかかろうとした所でランスが現れ助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as monsters tried to pounce on Kenshin and the others, Rance appeared and saved them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、ここまでだな、いったん撤退するぞ、愛
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, this is as far as we go. Let's retreat for now, Ai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、と愛が部隊に撤退指示を出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, Ai gave the order to the unit to retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍キャンプ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Military camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が目を覚ます、身体はまだ痛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin wakes up; his body still aches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いはどうなった、奴らはまだ近くにいるのか・・と愛に聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asks Ai, 'What happened with the battle? Are they still nearby?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨夜はギリギリの所でランス様に救われかろうじて脱出した、ルメイ焼却部隊は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai replies, 'Last night, we were saved by Lord Rance at the last moment and barely escaped. The Lumei Incineration Unit...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ近くにいるが、我々も消耗も激しく戦える状態では無い、特に謙信様が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...is still nearby, but we are severely exhausted and not in fighting condition, especially Lord Kenshin...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は大丈夫だと、元気だ・・それよりあの外道部隊を生かしておく訳にはいかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin insists, 'I'm fine, I'm strong... More importantly, we can't leave that fiendish unit alive.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理して出撃しようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He attempts to force himself to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこらランスが現れる、謙信ちゃん起きたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Rance appears, 'Kenshin-chan, you’re awake...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、出撃するだと・・元気だから大丈夫だ心配無用だと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What, you’re going to sortie? You say you’re fine and there’s no need to worry...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいだろう、ただし俺と今からセックスしてからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Fine, but only after you have sex with me right now.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はお前達を助けた、御褒美がほしい、それに戦うの鋭気を養うために謙信が抱きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I helped you all; I want a reward, and moreover, Kenshin, I want to hold you to regain your fighting spirit.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惚れた弱み・・わかった・・、ただしすぐに戦いに出たいから早い目で頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It’s your charm weakness... I understand. But I want to go into battle quickly, so please be quick about it.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し激しくやります、気絶する謙信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They do it a bit more intensely, Kenshin faints.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは愛に謙信を預け、出かけます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance entrusts Kenshin to Ai and sets out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが偵察から戻って来た、前方の小高い山に昨晩の魔物部隊がいるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami returned from reconnaissance: 'The monster unit from last night is on the small hill ahead.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ焼却師団という連中ね、２万弱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'They’re called the Lumei Incineration Division, just under 20,000 strong.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍を警戒してるようすよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'They seem to be wary of the Uesugi army.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、やるぞ。こちらは小数だからいつものように裏側にまわって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Alright, let’s do this. Since we’re few in number, like usual, we’ll go around to the back.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっきにボスを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'We’ll take down the boss all at once.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ焼却師団の司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei Incineration Division Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が大将軍ルメイからの手紙を見て喜んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general happily reads a letter from General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共の多数の焼却についてお褒めの言葉だ。より効率よく焼き殺す為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It praises the mass incineration of humans. For burning them more efficiently...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝方、風下から火をつけよとの指示もかかれている、なるほどとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It also instructs to set fire from downwind in the morning. 'I see,' they say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前方にいる人間の部隊、ＪＡＰＡＮから来た連中はどうしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'How are the human troops ahead, those who came from JAPAN?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も攻めてくるかな、罠をいっぱいしかけて待ち構えておいてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Will they attack again today? Let’s set many traps and lie in wait.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変です・・人間の部隊が強襲！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s terrible... The human troops are launching an assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、てめぇがボスだな、焼き殺してやるぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahahaha, you’re the boss, huh? I’ll burn you to death!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が倒れて・・魔物兵達は逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster general falls... the monster soldiers flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、これで謙信ちゃんを悩ましていた奴らは全滅だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, with this, those who troubled Kenshin-chan are completely wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uesugi army camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戻って来た、謙信が目をさまし愛を振り切って出撃しようとしていた所だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance returned as Kenshin woke up and was about to break away from Ai to sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が気になっていた敵は俺が倒した、もう安心しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I defeated the enemy you were concerned about. You can relax now.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっとしたような、申し訳ないような謙信、ありがとう、私も次はもっとがんばる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, looking relieved yet apologetic: 'Thank you. I will try harder next time too.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり無茶するな、お前達が無理をさせるな。と愛とかに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Don’t overdo it. Don’t push yourselves too hard,' he says to Ai and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理です、では・・謙信様を引き取って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It’s impossible. Then... please take care of Lord Kenshin.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉軍は私と勝虎で率いてこの地を守る任務を継続します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The Uesugi army will continue the mission to defend this land led by me and Katsutora.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、わかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahahaha, understood.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じでランスの元に来ます（カードゲット）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, they come back to Rance (card obtained).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信、がんばれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Kenshin, do your best.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は魔人退治に向かう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I am heading to hunt demons.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と別行動になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And we separate.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達、ミラクルメイン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Rance and the others marching, Miracle main.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが世界王になったが別によい、最後は自分がなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Rance became the World King, but it's alright; in the end, he will be the one who becomes it.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを見て異次元のスロージャイアントを思い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Seeing Babora, remembering the otherworldly Slow Giant.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While marching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶバボラの近くに来た。数キロ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve come quite close to Babora, just a few kilometers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっさんがはぁはぁと逃げてきた、助けてくれーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old man came running, panting, shouting ‘Help me!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （立ち絵表示しなくていいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No need to show standing picture.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に捕虜として捕まっていたのだが逃げてきたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had been captured as a prisoner by monsters but escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつらしんどい仕事を俺達にさせているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those bastards make us do the hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も魔人の食事の材料とかを運ばれていていたが自分だけ逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, they are transporting food ingredients for the demons, but he alone escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕虜には可愛い女の子はいるか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Are there any cute girls among the prisoners?'
